item.title: Note Taking with LaTeX: Part I (NeoVim)
item.author: Hashem A. Damrah
item.description: For a very long time, I have been trying to create the perfect setup for note taking in general (but more specifically, for math). Before, I used to use notion to take my notes, which was okay, but I wanted something much more productive. And thus, my system was BORN! Here are how some of my notes look like: You can look at my notes source code here. I also store all my final notes here.
